name: Shanghai Smash: Mahjong
description:
The more you match, the bigger the fun! Shanghai Smash!

Shanghai Smash is a Mahjong game where you have to match two tiles of the same pattern.
With more than 500 stages, various tiles and skills and Boss battles at the end of each episode, Shanghai Smash offers a Mahjong experience unlike no other.

If you are looking for a unique Shanghai Mahjong game, download Shanghai Smash right now!

# Easy to learn, a Mahjong game for everyone!
- With adorable characters and simple tile patterns, Shanghai Smash is great fun for everyone!

# More than 500 stages filled with challenging fun!
- Discover a fresh, new take on the Mahjong genre while playing through over 500 stages, solving missions and using different skills!

# Receive great rewards for defeating the Bosses!
- Defeat the Bosses in each episode and receive great rewards.

# A social Mahjong game to enjoy with your friends!
- Aim for the highest score on your Facebook friend ranking!
